summary: Sysbook Inventory component separation successfully tested. New dedicated SysbookInventoryTable.jsx loads correctly at admin sidebar > SYSBOOK > Inventory. All required columns (Book Name, Code, Grade, Subject, Publisher, Price, Stock, Alert, Pre-sale, Status) visible. Alert/threshold column shows global threshold (10) by default. Inline editing, filters, sorting, archive tab, fullscreen mode, stock adjustment dialog all working. Unatienda module unaffected with separate InventoryTab.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/sysbook/inventory/dashboard returns correct stats
Backend: GET /api/sysbook/inventory/products returns sysbook products only
Backend: POST /api/sysbook/inventory/products creates new product with is_private_catalog=True
Backend: PUT /api/sysbook/inventory/products/{book_id} updates product price and threshold
Backend: POST archive/restore endpoints work correctly
Backend: GET /api/sysbook/alerts/settings returns global_low_stock_threshold (10)
Backend: Sorting by name, stock, price works
Backend: Grade and subject filters work
Backend: Search by name/code/publisher works
Backend: Unatienda /api/store/products still works independently
Backend: Unatienda inventory adjust endpoint still works
Frontend: Sysbook Inventory page loads at /admin#sysbook-inventory
Frontend: All 10 columns visible: Book Name, Code, Grade, Subject, Publisher, Price, Stock, Alert, Pre-sale, Status
Frontend: Alert column shows global threshold (10) for products without custom threshold
Frontend: Clicking threshold cell opens inline editing input
Frontend: Grade filter works
Frontend: Subject filter works
Frontend: Search functionality works
Frontend: Sorting by column headers works
Frontend: Add Product button opens form dialog with correct fields
Frontend: Archive tab switches view
Frontend: Fullscreen mode works
Frontend: Stock cell click opens adjustment dialog with Add/Remove buttons
Frontend: Unatienda module loads correctly with separate InventoryTab
Frontend: Sidebar shows SYSBOOK section with all menu items
critical_code_review_comments: SysbookInventoryTable.jsx is now standalone with no Unatienda/legacy logic - correctly imports from @/modules/unatienda/components/InventoryImport
localStorage key changed from 'chipi_inv_col_order' to 'sysbook_inv_col_order' for column persistence
AdminDashboard.jsx routes sysbook-inventory to SysbookInventoryTab correctly (line ~340)
Backend /api/sysbook/inventory routes properly scoped with SYSBOOK_FILTER = {is_private_catalog: True}
Unatienda InventoryTab at /app/frontend/src/modules/unatienda/tabs/InventoryTab.jsx unchanged and working
seed_data_creation: Test products created and cleaned up during pytest execution (TEST_SEPARATION_*, TEST_UPDATE_*, TEST_ARCHIVE_*)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Sysbook inventory component split complete. SysbookInventoryTable.jsx is standalone at /app/frontend/src/modules/sysbook/. Unatienda has separate InventoryTab at /app/frontend/src/modules/unatienda/tabs/InventoryTab.jsx. Both modules work independently. Per-product threshold feature from iteration_186 still works.
